p: Another manuscript was published later by the same researchers based on the above mentioned principle and it was based on a novel series of 5-fluoro-6-(4-methylpiperazin-1-yl)-substitutedphenylbenzo[d]thiazoles. The novel class was reported and screened against different bacteria and fungi strains. The molecule bearing electron withdrawing moiety by induction e.g., fluoro in compound 26 has a role in enhancing antibacterial activity in comparison to the non-fluorinated derivatives [ 140].
